about.title: ABOUT THE PROJECT
text: Mode is an audio range designed to provide optimal performance and comfort for every mode of use. The system utilises a modular setup which allows the speaker and interface unit to be transferred from the MD2 Headband which features on-ear .

about.title: HOW IS YOUR VISUAL IDENTITY?
text: The interface uses gesture control via the touch sensitive speaker unit to wirelessly adjust audio preferences and the system is also available with active noise cancelling technology for a fully immersive experience.
